src:
CPNS 2019, Pemerintah Kota Tangerang Buka Lowongan 1.047 Kursi
05 Nov 2019, 03:21 by Antara, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Tangerang - Pemerintah Kota Tangerang akan membuka lowongan bagi 1.047 Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil atau CPNS 2019 yang dimulai 11 November 2019. Kepala Badan Kepegawaian dan Pengembangan Sumber Daya Manusia (BKPSDM) Kota Tangerang M. Lutfi mengatakan bahwa perekrutan CPNS tahun ini meliputi 101 tenaga kesehatan, 145 tenaga teknis, dan sisanya untuk guru.
"Untuk guru, kuota memang paling besar. Hal ini disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan di lapangan saat ini," katanya.
Lutfi mengatakan bahwa kuota perekrutan CPNS Kota Tangerang tahun ini lebih sedikit jika dibandingkan dengan tahun lalu.
"Tahun lalu, kami mengajukan 2000-an formasi. Menurun tapi ya semoga dalam pelaksanaannya lancar hingga selesai," katanya.
Kepala Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN) Bima Haria Wibisana mengumumkan bahwa masa pendaftaran sekaligus seleksi administrasi (SA) untuk CPNS 2019 akan berlangsung selama 14 hari, yakni pada 11-24 November 2019. Setelah proses pendaftaran rampung, pengumuman hasil Seleksi Administrasi (SA) akan disampaikan pada 16 Desember 2019.
“Nanti akan diumumkan siapa yang berhak untuk mengikuti Seleksi Kompetensi Dasar (SKD),” kata Bima dalam konferensi pers di Gedung Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi di Jakarta Selatan, Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019.
Berbeda dengan seleksi CPNS 2019 sebelumnya, kini para peserta yang tidak lolos SA akan diberikan hak sanggah selama tiga hari sejak pengumuman, yakni pada 16-19 Desember 2019. Adapun hasil sanggahan akan diumumkan pada 26 Desember 2019.
text:
CPNS 2019, Tangerang City Government Opens Vacancies 1,047 Seats
05 Nov 2019, 03:21 by Antara, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Tangerang - Tangerang City Government will open vacancies for 1,047 Civil Servant Candidates or CPNS 2019 starting November 11, 2019. Head of the Human Resources and Human Resources Development Agency (BKPSDM) of Tangerang City M. Lutfi said that the recruitment of CPNS this year included 101 health workers, 145 technical workers, and the rest for teachers.
"For teachers, the quota is the biggest. This is adjusted to the needs in the field at the moment," he said.
Lutfi said that the Tangerang City CPNS recruitment quota was less compared to last year.
"Last year, we submitted 2000 formations. It declined but yes hopefully the implementation will run smoothly until it is finished," he said.
Head of the Bima Haria Wibisana State Civil Service Agency (BKN) announced that the registration period as well as administrative selection (SA) for CPNS 2019 will last for 14 days, namely on 11-24 November 2019. After the registration process is complete, the announcement of the results of the Administration Selection (SA) will delivered on December 16, 2019.
"Later it will be announced who has the right to participate in the Basic Competence Selection (SKD)," Bima said in a press conference at the Ministry of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform Building in South Jakarta, Wednesday, 30 October 2019.
In contrast to the previous selection of CPNS 2019, now participants who did not qualify for the SA will be given refutation rights for three days from the announcement, namely on December 16-19, 2019. The results of the rebuttal will be announced on December 26, 2019.
